description:
This course is your personal guide for pleasant, engaged and meaningful life. we will cover many subjects through four main sections:

The first section is Introduction and it contains:

  • Welcome
  • What is happiness?.

The second section is "Pursuit of happiness" which contains:

  • Pillars of happiness
  • Learn optimism
  • Make your life simpler
    • The third section is "Living vs. Surviving" and it contains:
  • know your strengths and exploit it
  • Happiness at work
    • The fourth section is "Protect your happiness" and it contains:
  • Happiness Boosters
  • conclusion
title: Secrets of Happiness
